import React, { useState } from 'react' import checkImg from "./Wechat.jpeg" import { useContext } from 'react' import {proContext} from "../Context" export default function Checked() { const{TotalPrice}=useContext(proContext) const total = TotalPrice(); const [postMes,setPostMes]=useState({ postCode:"",postAddress:"",postName:"",postCall:"" }) console.log(postMes) return (

微信收款码

{total>0?

总金额：¥{total}

请填写您的收货信息：

邮编：

setPostMes((prev)=>({...prev,postCode:e.target.value}))}/>

地址：

setPostMes(e.target.value)}/>

收货人：

setPostMes(e.target.value)}/>

电话：

setPostMes(e.target.value)}/> <>
:

“您的购物车是空的”

}
) }
